programme.title: מאווקה נסיכת היער (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות. מאווקה היא נסיכה ביער קסום ותפקידה לשמור עליו ועל הטבע. כאשר בן אנוש ומוסיקאי מוכשר מופיע, ניצוצות האהבה עפים ומאווקה חייבת לבחור בין תפקידה כשומרת היער לבין אהבתה לבן האנוש. דיבוב עב': תובל שפיר. 2023.

programme.title: ג'ננה בסוואנה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. חיות הג'ונגל בסוואנה האפריקאית מצפות בשקיקה להצפה השנתית של הנהר, שלצערן מתעכבת. בילי הנמייה האמיצה וסוקרטס האריה הפחדן חוברים לחיות נוספות, כדי לגלות מה מקור הבעיה. ד.עב. במאים: ריינהרד קלוס, הולגר טאפה. 2010. כ' עב'.

programme.title: מפרץ ההרפתקאות: הסרט (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה. ריידר וכלבי יחידת החילוץ נקראים לעיר ההרפתקאות על מנת לנסות ולהציל אותה מראש העיר המדינגר, המשחק בצורה מסוכנת עם מזג האוויר בעיר וגרם להרס וחורבן. דיבוב עב': שיר כהן. במאי: קאל ברונקר. 2021. כ' עב'.

programme.title: אלי והמפלצות (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקת אנימציה מבוססת ספר ילדים מצליח. רוח רפאים שמחפשת מפלט ובית מוצאת אותו בחברת חבורת מפלצות חביבה, אך בדרך מסתבכת עם העולם החיצוני בו אורבת סכנה גדולה למפלצות, ומחליטה לחבור אליהן כדי לגבור עליו. דיבוב עב'. 2024. כ' עב'.

programme.title: סיפור הברווזים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מהיוצרים של "המיניונים". משפחת ברווזים יוצאת לראשונה לחופשה מפנקת בג'מייקה. בטעות מגיעה המשפחה לניו-יורק. וכעת היא צריכה למצוא את דרכה החוצה מהעיר שהיא הכל חוץ מגן עדן לברווזים. דיבוב: רשף לוי. 2023 כ' עב'.

programme.title: ארתור 3: מלחמת שני העולמות (מדובב)
programme.desc: חברים מדובבים: סרטים בשפה שלנו. החלק ה-3 בטרילוגיית "ארתור והמינימונים". מלתזר לוכד את ארתור, וזומם להשתלט על עולם בני האדם. ארתור וחבריו יוצאים למסע הרפתקני במטרה לעצור אותו. קולות: פרדי היימור, מיה פארו. 2010. כ' עב'.

programme.title: טרולים (מדובב)
programme.desc: על מנת להציל את חבריה מהברגנים, יוצאת פופי מנהיגת הטרולים האופטימית עם בראנץ' הטרול הנרגן, להרפתקה בעולמות רחוקים. דיבוב: לירון לב, נועה קירל. בימוי: וולט דורן, מייק מיטשל. 2016. כ' עב'.

programme.title: לא רעים בכלל (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מדליקה מבית דרימוורקס, ע"פ סדרת הספרים המצליחה. הזאב הרע וחבריו נתפסים על חם בעת ביצוע שוד, אך במקום ללכת לכלא הם מסכימים לעבור שיקום. האם הרעים הגדולים ביותר יכולים להפוך לטובים? דיבוב עב'. 2022. כ' עב'.

programme.title: מאווקה נסיכת היער (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות. מאווקה היא נסיכה ביער קסום ותפקידה לשמור עליו ועל הטבע. כאשר בן אנוש ומוסיקאי מוכשר מופיע, ניצוצות האהבה עפים ומאווקה חייבת לבחור בין תפקידה כשומרת היער לבין אהבתה לבן האנוש. דיבוב עב': תובל שפיר. 2023.

programme.title: לאסי 2 - הרפתקה חדשה (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. השקט בכפר קטן באוסטריה מופר עם פרשייה של גניבת כלבים גזעיים. לדגל נקראת לאסי, כלבת קולי בעלת תושייה, שבעזרת חושיה החדים עוזרת לילדי הכפר להשיב את הכלבים לבעליהם. דיבוב עב': שרון שחל, אלונה אלכנסדר. 2024.

programme.title: העי"ג (ענק ידידותי גדול)
programme.desc: סרט ההרפתקאות המקסים שביים סטיבן ספילברג עפ"י ספרו של רואלד דאל. לילה אחד מגיע לחלונה של סופי בת ה-10 בבית יתומים יצור ענק. למרות החשש הראשוני, היא מצטרפת לענק הידידותי למסע קסום. עם: רבקה הול, מארק ריילנס. קנדה, 2016.

programme.title: טרולים
programme.desc: קומדיית אנימציה מוזיקלית ומקסימה. על מנת להציל את חבריה הטרולים מהברגנים, יוצאת פופי נסיכת הטרולים יחד עם בראנץ' הנרגן, להרפתקה בעולמות רחוקים. עם: אנה קנדריק, ג'סטין טימברלייק. בימוי: וולט דורן, מייק מיטשל. 2016.

programme.title: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב

programme.desc: אנימציה מהיוצרים של "המיניונים". משפחת ברווזים יוצאת לראשונה לחופשה מפנקת בג'מייקה. בטעות מגיעה המשפחה לניו-יורק. וכעת היא צריכה למצוא את דרכה החוצה מהעיר שהיא הכל חוץ מגן עדן לברווזים. דיבוב: רשף לוי. 2023 כ' עב'.

programme.title: אלי והמפלצות (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקת אנימציה מבוססת ספר ילדים מצליח. רוח רפאים שמחפשת מפלט ובית מוצאת אותו בחברת חבורת מפלצות חביבה, אך בדרך מסתבכת עם העולם החיצוני בו אורבת סכנה גדולה למפלצות, ומחליטה לחבור אליהן כדי לגבור עליו. דיבוב עב'. 2024. כ' עב'.

programme.title: תעלול של משלוח (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות. המשך ללהיט "תעלול של טיול". צמד החברים מהג'ונגל, הדוב מיק מיק ואוסקר הארנב יוצאים להרפתקה מסמרת שיער בכדור פורח, כדי לאתר את הוריו של גור דוב גריזלי קטן ונטוש. דיבוב עב': אמנון וולף, אור דגן. 2022.

programme.title: ווילי - מהיר וחייכני (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה בדיבוב קורע של שחר חסון. ווילי הוא רכב מונית, אך בתוכו פועם מנוע של מכונית מרוץ. בעזרת חבריו הוא יוצא להרפתקה כדי לחלץ את אהובת לבו בלה, מכונית אדומה ויפהפייה שנחטפה ע"י כנופיית משאיות. 2018. כ' עב'.

programme.title: מיסטר לינק (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות זוכת גלובוס הזהב. יצור מפלצתי גדול ממדים וטוב לב, פונה לחוקר מפלצות נודע ומבקש שיוביל אותו לחיק משפחתו הרחוקה. השניים יוצאים למסע המרתק, אך אינם מודעים לסכנות האורבות. במאי: כריס באטלר. 2019. כ' עב'.

programme.title: לא רעים בכלל (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מדליקה מבית דרימוורקס, ע"פ סדרת הספרים המצליחה. הזאב הרע וחבריו נתפסים על חם בעת ביצוע שוד, אך במקום ללכת לכלא הם מסכימים לעבור שיקום. האם הרעים הגדולים ביותר יכולים להפוך לטובים? דיבוב עב'. 2022. כ' עב'.

programme.title: גנוב על הירח (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. בפרבר שכונתי, חבוי מתחת לבית מסתור ענקי, מתגורר גרו, המתכנן את השוד הגדול בהיסטוריה - הוא הולך לגנוב את הירח. גרו מוכן לכל קרב, עד למפגשו עם שלוש יתומות. דיבוב: עידן אלתרמן. במאי: פייר קופין. 2010. כ' עב'.\r\n.

programme.title: ארתור 3: מלחמת שני העולמות (מדובב)
programme.desc: חברים מדובבים: סרטים בשפה שלנו. החלק ה-3 בטרילוגיית "ארתור והמינימונים". מלתזר לוכד את ארתור, וזומם להשתלט על עולם בני האדם. ארתור וחבריו יוצאים למסע הרפתקני במטרה לעצור אותו. קולות: פרדי היימור, מיה פארו. 2010. כ' עב'.

programme.title: אמילי והיגואר האחרון (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה, מאת היוצרים של 'מיה והאריה הלבן'. נערה צעירה, אשר גדלה בכפר קטן למרגלות האמזונס, חוזרת אליו לאחר שנים, כדי להציל את חברה היגואר אותו נטשה, מפני סוחרי בע"ח. דיבוב עב': מונה מור. 2024.

programme.title: לאסי 2 - הרפתקה חדשה (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. השקט בכפר קטן באוסטריה מופר עם פרשייה של גניבת כלבים גזעיים. לדגל נקראת לאסי, כלבת קולי בעלת תושייה, שבעזרת חושיה החדים עוזרת לילדי הכפר להשיב את הכלבים לבעליהם. דיבוב עב': שרון שחל, אלונה אלכנסדר. 2024.

programme.title: לא רעים בכלל
programme.desc: אנימציה מבית דרימוורקס, ע"פ סדרת הספרים המצליחה. הזאב הרע וחבריו נתפסים על חם בעת ביצוע שוד, אך במקום ללכת לכלא הם מסכימים לעבור שיקום. האם הרעים הגדולים ביותר יכולים להפוך לטובים? דיבוב: אקוופינה. במאי: פייר פריפל. 2022.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
Back to the Future Part II
Back to the Future Part III
Back to the Future Part II
Back to the Future Part III
Rent
programme.desc: Musical set in 1980s New York, following a year in the life of young artists living in the East Village. A would-be film-maker pines for his lost love and an HIV-positive musician tries to recover from his drug addiction, while their landlord abandons his bohemian ways for the pursuit of wealth. Rosario Dawson stars alongside members of the original Broadway cast, including Taye Diggs, Anthony Rapp and Adam Pascal.(n)

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Teenager Celie suffers horribly at the hands of her abusive father Alfonso until she is married off against her will to local farmer Mister, who expects her to take care of his three children. Celie's spirited sister Nettie refuses to submit to Mister and leaves Georgia, but promises to write every day. Years pass and Celie has been worn down to quiet subservience, until Mister's mistress, sultry jazz singer Shug Avery, sashays into town and lights a fire in the broken wife. Musical drama based on Alice Walker's 1982 novel, starring Fantasia Barrino, Taraji P Henson, Colman Domingo and Danielle Brooks.(n)

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: In the months leading up to the Second World War, a young London stockbroker attempts to rescue hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia. Fifty years later he comes to terms with the guilt and grief he carried with him for decades. Drama based on a true story, starring Anthony Hopkins, Lena Olin and Johnny Flynn.(n)

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: Ice skater Tonya Harding rises through the ranks at the US figure skating championships, but her future in the sport is thrown into question by a shocking incident after her ex-husband steps in. Director Craig Gillespie's comedy biopic, starring Margot Robbie, Sebastian Stan, and Allison Janney, who won a Bafta and an Oscar for her performance.(n)

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: An idle womaniser pretends to be a father to meet women in a single mothers' group - but he starts to change his selfish ways when a lonely youngster with a depressed mum becomes emotionally attached to him. Romantic comedy adapted from Nick Hornby's novel, starring Hugh Grant, Toni Collette, Nicholas Hoult and Rachel Weisz.(n)

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: A soldier falls in love with a student he meets while on two weeks' leave, and he promises to seek her out after completing his tour of duty. However, in the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, he decides to re-enlist in the army, putting their relationship to the test. Romantic drama, with Channing Tatum and Amanda Seyfried.(n)

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Rachel Marron, a famous singer and actress is subjected to death threats by an obsessive fan and persuaded to hire a former secret service agent as her bodyguard. However, neither she or her new minder realise the effect they are about to have on each other's lives. Romantic thriller directed by Mick Jackson, starring Kevin Costner, Whitney Houston, Gary Kemp and Bill Cobbs.(n)

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Two single women living on opposite sides of the Atlantic agree to exchange houses over the Christmas holidays. In their new surroundings, both women unexpectedly encounter prospective partners, but as the house swap draws to a close, difficult decisions have to be made about their blossoming relationships. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jack Black, Jude Law and Eli Wallach.(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: A naive young literature student's life is thrown into turmoil by an affair with a mysterious billionaire. Initially she is intrigued by his aloof and distant manner, but soon realises he is harbouring dark secrets and desires. Erotic drama based on EL James' bestseller, starring Jamie Dornan and Dakota Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: The bookish Anastasia Steele and damaged billionaire playboy Christian Grey continue their sadomasochistic relationship, while their safety is threatened by strangers from his past. While Christian wrestles with his inner demons, Anastasia must confront the anger and envy of the women who came before her. Erotic drama sequel to Fifty Shades of Grey, starring Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan, Eric Johnson, Bella Heathcote and Rita Ora.(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: As tycoon Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia revel in a life of luxury, their happiness is endangered by her former boss. Conclusion of the romantic thriller trilogy based on EL James' novel, starring Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan and Eric Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.(n)

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: American zoologist Dian Fossey gives up her comfortable city life to research endangered mountain gorillas in Rwanda. Living among the apes, she develops a close bond with the animals and becomes an expert in how they communicate, while dedicating the rest of her life to protecting gorillas from extinction. Fact-based drama, starring Sigourney Weaver, Bryan Brown, Julie Harris and Iain Cuthbertson.(n)

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: Following the assassination of her husband, President John F Kennedy, Jacqueline Kennedy battles with grief and trauma to regain her faith, console her children, and define JFK's legacy. Director Pablo Larrain's Bafta-winning drama, starring Natalie Portman, Peter Sarsgaard and Greta Gerwig. Mica Levi provided the Oscar-nominated score.(n)

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Rachel Marron, a famous singer and actress is subjected to death threats by an obsessive fan and persuaded to hire a former secret service agent as her bodyguard. However, neither she or her new minder realise the effect they are about to have on each other's lives. Romantic thriller directed by Mick Jackson, starring Kevin Costner, Whitney Houston, Gary Kemp and Bill Cobbs.(n)

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Two single women living on opposite sides of the Atlantic agree to exchange houses over the Christmas holidays. In their new surroundings, both women unexpectedly encounter prospective partners, but as the house swap draws to a close, difficult decisions have to be made about their blossoming relationships. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jack Black, Jude Law and Eli Wallach.(n)

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: In the months leading up to the Second World War, a young London stockbroker attempts to rescue hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia. Fifty years later he comes to terms with the guilt and grief he carried with him for decades. Drama based on a true story, starring Anthony Hopkins, Lena Olin and Johnny Flynn.(n)

programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: The younger son of George V struggles to cope with an uncontrollable stammer, prompting his wife to enlist the aid of an eccentric Australian speech therapist. The support and friendship of the doctor prove invaluable when a crisis places the repressed prince on the throne, just as the outbreak of the Second World War leaves the country in need of a strong king. Oscar-winning fact-based drama, starring Colin Firth, Geoffrey Rush, Helena Bonham Carter and Guy Pearce.(n)

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: In German-occupied Poland during the Second World War, businessman and Nazi Party member Oskar Schindler is deeply affected when he witnesses the clearing of the Krakow Ghetto. He decides to try to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes.(n)

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: Bruno, a boy in Nazi Germany, moves to the country when his father is placed in charge of a concentration camp. While exploring the woods close to the facility's boundary, he spots a Jewish youngster being held there, and the two become friends - but Bruno remains innocently oblivious to the camp's true purpose. Drama, starring David Thewlis, Asa Butterfield and Jack Scanlon.(n)

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: A radio DJ contemplates suicide after a listener embarks on a murderous rampage in response to one of his broadcasts. He is saved by a now-homeless former professor of medieval history, who encourages him to retrieve what he claims is the Holy Grail. When the DJ later learns that he is responsible for his saviour's misfortunes, he feels compelled to make amends. Terry Gilliam's comedy drama, with Robin Williams, Jeff Bridges, Amanda Plummer and Mercedes Ruehl.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with HIV and given 30 days to live discovers that many treatments for his condition are not available in the US. With the aid of a transsexual Aids patient, he sets up a scheme to smuggle the drugs into the country and distribute them to those in need. Fact-based drama, starring Oscar winners Matthew McConaughey and Jared Leto, with Jennifer Garner and Steve Zahn.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: An American naval reserve pilot is called up for service in the Korean War, and must leave his family and civilian job as a lawyer. In command of a corps of naval pilots, he heads a bombing campaign on strategic Communist positions, but later comes to question the morality of the conflict. Adventure, starring William Holden, Grace Kelly, Fredric March and Mickey Rooney.

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: The ruthless captain of a US destroyer develops an obsession with tracking down a Russian submarine. As he drives his men harder, he fails to anticipate the consequences of his actions - leading to a fatal mistake. Cold War thriller, starring Richard Widmark, Sidney Poitier, Martin Balsam, Wally Cox, Eric Portman and Donald Sutherland.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her father's killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderer's trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper.

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: In German-occupied Poland during the Second World War, businessman and Nazi Party member Oskar Schindler is deeply affected when he witnesses the clearing of the Krakow Ghetto. He decides to try to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes.

programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: The younger son of George V struggles to cope with an uncontrollable stammer, prompting his wife to enlist the aid of an eccentric Australian speech therapist. The support and friendship of the doctor prove invaluable when a crisis places the repressed prince on the throne, just as the outbreak of the Second World War leaves the country in need of a strong king. Oscar-winning fact-based drama, starring Colin Firth, Geoffrey Rush, Helena Bonham Carter and Guy Pearce.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: A blind, hard-drinking war veteran pays a timid college student to accompany him on a weekend break in the big city, where he plans to make the most of life. However, the youngster is shocked to learn that at the end of their trip, his new friend plans to kill himself. Comedy drama, starring an Oscar-winning Al Pacino, Chris O'Donnell, Gabrielle Anwar and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper. On his return to the US following four tours of duty in Iraq, he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father far more difficult to deal with than the demands of warfare. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: May 1940. As the Nazis advance against Britain's European allies, newly elected prime minister Winston Churchill must decide whether to leave neighbouring countries to their fate, by striking a peace deal with Hitler, or fight on against terrifying odds for the greater good. Double Oscar and Bafta-winning period drama, starring Gary Oldman, Lily James and Kristin Scott Thomas.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth I faces threats at home and abroad, as Mary, Queen of Scots plots against her while the King of Spain builds a vast armada to undertake an invasion of England. Unable to reconcile her feelings for the dashing Sir Walter Raleigh with her duty to her country, the monarch engineers a romance between the courtier and one of her ladies-in-waiting. Historical drama sequel, with Cate Blanchett, Clive Owen, Geoffrey Rush and Samantha Morton.

programme.title: Paper Moon
programme.desc: A Depression-era conman meets a canny nine-year-old orphan, whom he realises could be his daughter, and agrees to take her to her aunt. Along the way, he discovers the little girl is just as cunning as he is, and they form a successful criminal partnership. Drama, starring Ryan O'Neal alongside real-life daughter Tatum. With Madeline Kahn, John Hillerman and Randy Quaid.

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: A grizzled drifter rescues a nun from a gang of rapists and gets roped into escorting her across the Mexican desert. He gradually realises there is more to his new companion than meets the eye - and she may be hiding a surprising secret. Don Siegel's Western, starring Clint Eastwood, Shirley MacLaine, Manolo Fabregas, Alberto Morin and John Kelly.

programme.title: El Dorado
programme.desc: An ageing gunfighter is drawn into the conflict between a land-grabbing cattle baron and a ranching family, but gets wounded in the process. A year later, he returns to town to find the situation has not improved - so along with his sidekick and the drunken town sheriff, he fights to defend the family from its enemies. Western, starring John Wayne, Robert Mitchum, James Caan and Ed Asner.

programme.title: Holiday Inn
programme.desc: A song-and-dance man tires of the bright lights and retires to a farm, but boredom soon prompts him to dream up an ambitious plan for the place. Musical, featuring the classic song White Christmas, starring Bing Crosby, Fred Astaire and Virginia Dale.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: A faded film star from the silent-movie era is fixated with making a comeback. When she meets a struggling screenwriter on the run from debt collectors, she persuades him to write a script that will mark her spectacular return to the screen. However, he takes advantage of the deluded actress, becoming her lover in a relationship where their mutual deceit ends in tragedy. Drama, with Gloria Swanson, William Holden and Eric von Stroheim.

programme.title: Quartet
programme.desc: Three former opera singers prepare for their annual concert to mark Verdi's birthday and raise funds for their retirement home. However, this year, a famous diva has joined the group, and her history with the others threatens the performance. Comedy drama, directed by Dustin Hoffman and starring Maggie Smith, Billy Connolly, Tom Courtenay, Pauline Collins and Michael Gambon.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper. On his return to the US following four tours of duty in Iraq, he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father far more difficult to deal with than the demands of warfare. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: May 1940. As the Nazis advance against Britain's European allies, newly elected prime minister Winston Churchill must decide whether to leave neighbouring countries to their fate, by striking a peace deal with Hitler, or fight on against terrifying odds for the greater good. Double Oscar and Bafta-winning period drama, starring Gary Oldman, Lily James and Kristin Scott Thomas.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: In the months leading up to the Second World War, a young London stockbroker attempts to rescue hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia. Fifty years later he comes to terms with the guilt and grief he carried with him for decades. Drama based on a true story, starring Anthony Hopkins, Lena Olin and Johnny Flynn.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Teenager Celie suffers horribly at the hands of her abusive father Alfonso until she is married off against her will to local farmer Mister, who expects her to take care of his three children. Celie's spirited sister Nettie refuses to submit to Mister and leaves Georgia, but promises to write every day. Years pass and Celie has been worn down to quiet subservience, until Mister's mistress, sultry jazz singer Shug Avery, sashays into town and lights a fire in the broken wife. Musical drama based on Alice Walker's 1982 novel, starring Fantasia Barrino, Taraji P Henson, Colman Domingo and Danielle Brooks.

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: When a couple flee Europe in 1947, their new lives in the US are changed by a strange client. Director Brady Corbet's drama, starring Adrien Brody, Felicity Jones, Guy Pearce and Joe Alwyn.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: An idealistic sports agent produces a mission statement at work promising to treat clients fairly. Unfortunately, it costs him his job. Forced to set up an agency on his own, the only people prepared to stand by him are a lovelorn staff accountant and a footballer. Cameron Crowe's romantic comedy drama, with Tom Cruise, Renee Zellweger, Kelly Preston, Jonathan Lipnicki, and Cuba Gooding Jr, who won an Oscar for his performance.

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: American zoologist Dian Fossey gives up her comfortable city life to research endangered mountain gorillas in Rwanda. Living among the apes, she develops a close bond with the animals and becomes an expert in how they communicate, while dedicating the rest of her life to protecting gorillas from extinction. Fact-based drama, starring Sigourney Weaver, Bryan Brown, Julie Harris and Iain Cuthbertson.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: A blind, hard-drinking war veteran pays a timid college student to accompany him on a weekend break in the big city, where he plans to make the most of life. However, the youngster is shocked to learn that at the end of their trip, his new friend plans to kill himself. Comedy drama, starring an Oscar-winning Al Pacino, Chris O'Donnell, Gabrielle Anwar and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: Molly's Game
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about Molly Bloom, an Olympic-class skier who ran the world's most exclusive high-stakes poker game for a decade before being arrested in the middle of the night by FBI agents wielding automatic weapons. Her players included Hollywood royalty, sports stars, business titans and finally - unbeknownst to her - the Russian Mob. Directed by The West Wing creator Aaron Sorkin, and starring Jessica Chastain, Idris Elba and Kevin Costner.

programme.title: The Blind Side
programme.desc: A middle-class family take in a hulking homeless teenager, who has no education or skills to speak of. The indomitable wife encourages him to turn his life around, helping him to get the grades he needs for a college scholarship and hone his sporting skills to become an American football player. Fact-based drama, starring an Oscar-winning Sandra Bullock alongside Quinton Aaron and Tim McGraw.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: A soldier falls in love with a student he meets while on two weeks' leave, and he promises to seek her out after completing his tour of duty. However, in the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, he decides to re-enlist in the army, putting their relationship to the test. Romantic drama, with Channing Tatum and Amanda Seyfried.

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: A single man gets the chance to turn his unhappy life around when his father reveals that they both have the ability to travel through time and change their personal history. He uses his newfound talent to try to improve his love life and win the heart of an American woman he has fallen for. Romantic fantasy comedy, with Domhnall Gleeson, Rachel McAdams and Bill Nighy.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom returns to her childhood home of Plethora, Maine, to attend the funeral of her father, the former town mayor who beat his wife behind closed doors. Upon returning to Boston, Lily is attracted to Ryle Kincaid, a neurosurgeon with a dark side, and old flame Atlas Corrigan. Drama based on the bestselling novel, starring Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni, Jenny Slate and Brandon Sklenar.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: A lonely and past-his-prime American actor travels to Japan to film a commercial. During a depressing night in the hotel bar, he meets a spirited younger woman and the pair strike up a close friendship, exploring Tokyo and helping each other face the mundanities of everyday life. Sofia Coppola's comedy drama, starring Bill Murray, Scarlett Johansson and Giovanni Ribisi.

programme.title: The Angels' Share
programme.desc: An unemployed man with a criminal record is put on community service just as his son is born, and resolves to make a better life for his family. Befriending three fellow offenders facing an equally uncertain future, they decide to make a fresh start by stealing a cask of valuable whisky. Ken Loach's comedy drama, starring Paul Brannigan and John Henshaw.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: A singing and dancing war widow tries to shield her son from her husband's interfering wealthy parents by absconding to New York, where she is reunited with her former showbiz partner. They resurrect their old dance act, while her in-laws begin a campaign to claim custody of their grandchild. Musical, starring Fred Astaire, Betty Hutton, Roland Young and Ruth Warrick.(n)

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
programme.desc: An aspiring writer falls for a seemingly happy-go-lucky woman living in the same apartment building, and is drawn to her unconventional lifestyle. However, he detects her quirky demeanour is masking a colourful past, while her mysterious visits to an imprisoned gangster have unexpected consequences. Romantic comedy drama based on Truman Capote's novel, with Audrey Hepburn, George Peppard, Mickey Rooney and Martin Balsam.(n)

programme.title: Pretty in Pink
programme.desc: Misfit high-school girl Andie Walsh unexpectedly attracts the attentions of a rich, popular boy, but the course of true love runs far from smoothly when their two worlds collide. Romantic drama, starring Molly Ringwald, Andrew McCarthy, James Spader, Jon Cryer and Harry Dean Stanton.(n)

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A determined factory welder leads a double life as an exotic dancer by night. Her real ambition is to become a ballet star, and with the support of her boss and an instructor, she sets out to realise her dreams. Drama, with Jennifer Beals, Michael Nouri, Lilia Skala, Sunny Johnson, Kyle T Heffner and Lee Ving.(n)

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: A lonely and past-his-prime American actor travels to Japan to film a commercial. During a depressing night in the hotel bar, he meets a spirited younger woman and the pair strike up a close friendship, exploring Tokyo and helping each other face the mundanities of everyday life. Sofia Coppola's comedy drama, starring Bill Murray, Scarlett Johansson and Giovanni Ribisi.(n)

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom returns to her childhood home of Plethora, Maine, to attend the funeral of her father, the former town mayor who beat his wife behind closed doors. Upon returning to Boston, Lily is attracted to Ryle Kincaid, a neurosurgeon with a dark side, and old flame Atlas Corrigan. Drama based on the bestselling novel, starring Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni, Jenny Slate and Brandon Sklenar.(n)

programme.title: The Post
programme.desc: In 1971, an American military analyst uncovers the depths of the US government's deceptions about the futility of the Vietnam War, and takes action by copying top-secret documents that would become the Pentagon Papers. Washington Post owner Kay Graham and her editor Ben Bradlee discover The New York Times is preparing an explosive expose on those papers and, determined to compete, set out to publish them first. Steven Spielberg's fact-based drama, starring Meryl Streep, Tom Hanks, Sarah Paulson and Bob Odenkirk.(n)

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: An idle womaniser pretends to be a father to meet women in a single mothers' group - but he starts to change his selfish ways when a lonely youngster with a depressed mum becomes emotionally attached to him. Romantic comedy adapted from Nick Hornby's novel, starring Hugh Grant, Toni Collette, Nicholas Hoult and Rachel Weisz.(n)

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: In the months leading up to the Second World War, a young London stockbroker attempts to rescue hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia. Fifty years later he comes to terms with the guilt and grief he carried with him for decades. Drama based on a true story, starring Anthony Hopkins, Lena Olin and Johnny Flynn.(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper. On his return to the US following four tours of duty in Iraq, he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father far more difficult to deal with than the demands of warfare. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.(n)

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: Following the assassination of her husband, President John F Kennedy, Jacqueline Kennedy battles with grief and trauma to regain her faith, console her children, and define JFK's legacy. Director Pablo Larrain's Bafta-winning drama, starring Natalie Portman, Peter Sarsgaard and Greta Gerwig. Mica Levi provided the Oscar-nominated score.(n)

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: A blind, hard-drinking war veteran pays a timid college student to accompany him on a weekend break in the big city, where he plans to make the most of life. However, the youngster is shocked to learn that at the end of their trip, his new friend plans to kill himself. Comedy drama, starring an Oscar-winning Al Pacino, Chris O'Donnell, Gabrielle Anwar and Philip Seymour Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A TV newscaster's life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boy's hardworking single mom. Romantic drama, starring BJ Britt.(n)

programme.title: A Keller Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Three reluctant adult siblings join their parents on a Christmas river cruise through Europe, each dealing with personal issues. Drama, starring Brandon Routh (Superman Returns), Jonathan Bennett and Eden Sher.(n)

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: When a solitary writer adopts and bonds with a Great Dane that belonged to a late friend, she begins to come to terms with her past and her own creative inner life. Drama based on the novel by Sigrid Nunez, starring Naomi Watts and Bill Murray.(n)

programme.title: Three Wisest Men
programme.desc: Three siblings deal with personal changes and their mother's decision to sell the family home before Christmas. Between in-laws, wild animals, and a mall Santa, they try to make the holidays perfect. Drama, starring Paul Campbell, Tyler Hynes, Andrew Walker and Margaret Colin.(n)

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: Nobody is ready for the mayhem that ensues when six of the worst youngsters disrupt the town's annual Christmas performance. Festive comedy based on the Barbara Robinson novel, starring Lauren Graham, Judy Greer and Pete Holmes.(n)

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A writer travels to the remote compound of pop star Alfred Moretti, where she discovers the twisted plans of his cult. Writer/director Mark Anthony Green's thriller, starring Ayo Edebiri, John Malkovich and Juliette Lewis.(n)

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: When a solitary writer adopts and bonds with a Great Dane that belonged to a late friend, she begins to come to terms with her past and her own creative inner life. Drama based on the novel by Sigrid Nunez, starring Naomi Watts and Bill Murray.(n)

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: A widowed mother's first date in years takes a chilling turn when she's bombarded with anonymous threatening phone messages during their dinner, leaving her questioning if her charming suitor is behind the harassment. Director Christopher Landon's thriller, starring Meghann Fahy and Brandon Sklenar.(n)

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: Nobody is ready for the mayhem that ensues when six of the worst youngsters disrupt the town's annual Christmas performance. Festive comedy based on the Barbara Robinson novel, starring Lauren Graham, Judy Greer and Pete Holmes.(n)

programme.title: Until Dawn
programme.desc: A year after their friend disappeared, a group find themselves trapped in a time loop, where they are hunted and killed unless they survive until dawn. Video game-inspired horror, starring Ella Rubin, Michael Cimino and Odessa A'zion.(n)

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: In 2054, criminal Mickey Barnes signs up to be a worker who agrees to be reprinted every time he perishes. He flees Earth with friend and accomplice Timo on an interstellar mission to the remote colony of Niflheim, masterminded by Kenneth Marshall and his wife, Ylfa. The 17th iteration of Mickey is presumed dead after a close encounter with creatures on the planet's surface, but is saved from a grim fate, and when he arrives back at base, Mickey meets his reprinted self. Director Bong Joon Ho's sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun.(n)

programme.title: Thieves Highway
programme.desc: After discovering a plot to haul stolen cattle in the middle of nowhere, a desperate and isolated lawman becomes the only person standing between lethal rustlers and a clear run to the border. Thriller, starring Lochlyn Munro.(n)

programme.title: The Alto Knights
programme.desc: In May 1957, New York mob boss Frank Costello, head of the Luciano crime clan, is shot outside his penthouse elevator. The gunman, Vincent Gigante, acts under orders from Frank's former friend-turned-rival, Vito Genovese, who defies Mafia protocol by ordering the hit without approval from other families. Frank survives, deepening a feud marked by betrayal and Vito's volatile marriage to Anna Vernotico. Director Barry Levinson's drama based on true events, starring Robert De Niro, Cosmo Jarvis and Debra Messing.(n)

Happy Christmas
programme.desc: Irresponsible Anna Kendrick shakes up the life of her older brother and his family when she goes to stay with him in Chicago. Comedy drama with Lena Dunham.

programme.title: Snow Day
programme.desc: After heavy snowfall, a group of kids do their best to make sure that school stays closed for as long as possible. Family comedy starring Chevy Chase.(86mins).

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Surviving Christmas
programme.desc: There's Christmas chaos when lonely millionaire Ben Affleck hires a family to spend the holidays with. Comedy with Christina Applegate. Strong language/sexual references.

programme.title: Christmas With The Kranks
programme.desc: Tim Allen and Jamie Lee Curtis cause uproar in their Christmas-crazy suburb when they give the festivities a miss. Dingdong comedy, based on a John Grisham story.

programme.title: The Night Before Christmas In...
programme.desc: The Queen of Hearts has outlawed Christmas! Can St Nick, Alice, the Mad Hatter and March Hare save the day? Animation with Emilia Clarke, Gerard Butler and Simone Ashley.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Vince Vaughn stars as Santa's loser older brother Fred, forced into helping out the elves after Saint Nick (Paul Giamatti) bails him out of trouble. Comedic violence.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: In need of a romantic reboot, Cameron Diaz and Kate Winslet swap countries to meet the men of their dreams, Jude Law and Jack Black. Seasonal romcom. Strong language/sex.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Spirited adaptation of the evergreen children's classic about four very different girls. Winona Ryder, Claire Danes and Kirsten Dunst stand out from a superb cast.

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: Nobody is ready for the mayhem and surprises that ensue when six of the worst youngsters disrupt the town's yearly Christmas performance.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Richard Curtis's romantic comedy following the intertwining lives of a group of loved-up Londoners. Hugh Grant, Colin Firth and Liam Neeson star.

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: Richard Curtis' Sky Original festive comedy about a genie, a man and landing a chance to fix the mess you've made of life. Melissa McCarthy and Paapa Essiedu star.

programme.desc: Small business owner Hope Goldman performs facials to celebrity clientele and powerful businesswomen. She is poised to launch her own skincare line, but is in arrears with rent on her store at a shopping complex. programme.title: The Last Stop In Yuma County
programme.desc: While stuck at a rural Arizona rest stop, a salesman is thrust into a hostage situation by the arrival of two ruthless bank robbers. Writer/director Francis Galluppi's crime thriller, starring Jim Cummings, Faizon Love and Jocelin Donahue.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nester's mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption. Writer/director Jed Hart's thriller, starring Lyndsey Marshal and Declan Adamson.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: An assassin tries to make amends in an attempt to restore the sight of a beautiful young singer. Director/Producer John Woo's remake of his namesake 1989 thriller, starring Nathalie Emmanuel, Omar Sy and Sam Worthington.

programme.title: Drop
programme.desc: A widowed mother's first date in years takes a chilling turn when she's bombarded with anonymous threatening phone messages during their dinner, leaving her questioning if her charming suitor is behind the harassment. Director Christopher Landon's thriller, starring Meghann Fahy and Brandon Sklenar.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom returns to her childhood home of Plethora, Maine, to attend the funeral of her father, the former town mayor who beat his wife behind closed doors. Upon returning to Boston, Lily is attracted to Ryle Kincaid, a neurosurgeon with a dark side, and old flame Atlas Corrigan. Drama based on the bestselling novel, starring Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni, Jenny Slate and Brandon Sklenar.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. Director Micha

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: Environmental activists hijack an energy company's gala in Canary Wharf and take 300 hostages and an ex-soldier now working as a window cleaner tries to rescue them. Action thriller, starring Daisy Ridley. Action thriller, starring Daisy Ridley and Clive Owen.

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: A mercenary is assigned a target on a flight, but when rival assassins board the plane, the hunter and the hunted are forced to team up. Action thriller, starring Josh Hartnett, Katee Sackhoff and Julian Kostov.

programme.title: Juror #2
programme.desc: Magazine writer and family man Justin Kemp is sequestered to serve on the trial of James Sythe, who is accused of killing his girlfriend Kendall one year ago, following a fight in a bar. Justin faces an agonising moral dilemma - he was at the same pub as the defendant that fateful night, and struck something on the road during the drive home, which might have been Kendall. Polar opposites, Emily and Linda must soon work through their differences to escape from a wildly outrageous and dangerous jungle adventure.

While Brad counts the hours till he can escape the onslaught of crazy relatives, Kate begins to wonder about her own choices and ponders whether her family members are so crazy after all.

programme.title: The Man Who Invented Christmas
programme.desc: In 1843 London, author Charles Dickens finds himself in financial trouble after writing three unsuccessful novels in a row. Desperate for a hit, Dickens relies on real-life inspiration and his vivid imagination to bring Ebenezer Scrooge, Tiny Tim and other classic characters to life in "A Christmas Carol," forever changing the holiday season into the celebration known today.

programme.title: Prancer: A Christmas Tale

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: Armed with nothing but a hatful of dreams, young chocolatier Willy Wonka manages to change the world, one delectable bite at a time.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Torn apart from her sister and her children, Celie faces many hardships in life, including an abusive husband. With support from a sultry singer named Shug Avery, as well as her stand-her-ground stepdaughter, Celie ultimately finds extraordinary strength in the unbreakable bonds of a new kind of sisterhood.

programme.title: Sing Sing
programme.desc: A man is imprisoned at Sing Sing for a crime he didn't commit. When joined by a wary outsider, he finds purpose in staging an original comedy with a theater group of other incarcerated men.

programme.title: Mortal Kombat
programme.desc: Hunted by the fearsome warrior Sub-Zero, MMA fighter Cole Young finds sanctuary at the temple of Lord Raiden. Training with experienced fighters Liu Kang, Kung Lao and the rogue mercenary Kano, Cole prepares to stand with Earth's greatest champions to take on the enemies from Outworld in a high-stakes battle for the universe.

programme.title: Country Doctor

programme.title: Thoughts & Prayers

programme.title: Missing

However, as she digs ever deeper, her digital sleuthing soon raises more questions than answers.

The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-dri
